languages.text: {n}Амасек приятно согревает горло — вы чувствуете пряные нотки, привкус дубовой бочки и яркий землистый аромат. На душе становится немного спокойнее, а стакан, кажется, пустеет слишком быстро.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Амасек приятно согревает горло — вы чувствуете пряные нотки, привкус дубовой бочки и яркий землистый аромат. На душе становится немного спокойнее, а стакан, кажется, пустеет слишком быстро.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The amasec warms your throat pleasantly — you can make out a hint of spice, the flavour of an oak barrel, and a distinct earthy aroma. You feel a little more at peace, and you reach the bottom of the glass sooner than you'd like.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Амасек приятно согревает горло — вы чувствуете пряные нотки, привкус дубовой бочки и яркий землистый аромат. На душе становится немного спокойнее, а стакан, кажется, пустеет слишком быстро.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The amasec warms the throat pleasantly — you can make out a hint of spice, the flavor of an oak barrel, and a distinct earthy aroma. You feel a little more at peace, and the glass seems to run dry too quickly.{/n}

{n}The amasec warms the throat pleasantly — you can make out a hint of spice, the flavor of an oak barrel, and a distinct earthy aroma. You feel a little more at peace, and the glass seems to run dry too quickly.{/n}

{n}The amasec warms your throat pleasantly — you can make out a hint of spice, the flavour of an oak barrel, and a distinct earthy aroma. You feel a little more at peace, and you reach the bottom of the glass sooner than you'd like.{/n}

{n}The amasec warms your throat pleasantly — you can make out a hint of spice, the flavour of an oak barrel, and a distinct earthy aroma. You feel a little more at peace, and you reach the bottom of the glass sooner than you'd like.{/n}

{n}The amasec warms your throat pleasantly — you can make out a hint of spice, the flavour of an oak barrel, and a distinct earthy aroma. You feel a little more at peace, and you reach the bottom of the glass sooner than you'd like.{/n}

languages.text: {n}艾玛赛克酒的芬芳让你的喉咙充满了愉悦的暖意，你分辨出了香料与橡木桶的味道，以及明显的泥土芳香。你感觉放松了下来，甚至还没有反应过来，杯里的酒就已经一饮而尽了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The amasec warms your throat pleasantly — you can make out a hint of spice, the flavour of an oak barrel, and a distinct earthy aroma. You feel a little more at peace, and you reach the bottom of the glass sooner than you'd like.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}艾玛赛克酒的芬芳让你的喉咙充满了愉悦的暖意，你分辨出了香料与橡木桶的味道，以及明显的泥土芳香。你感觉放松了下来，甚至还没有反应过来，杯里的酒就已经一饮而尽了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El amasec te calienta la garganta de forma agradable. Distingues un cierto picor, el sabor de un barril de madera de roble y un peculiar aroma a tierra. Sientes la paz, y la copa se vacía antes de lo que te habría gustado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The amasec warms your throat pleasantly — you can make out a hint of spice, the flavour of an oak barrel, and a distinct earthy aroma. You feel a little more at peace, and you reach the bottom of the glass sooner than you'd like.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El amasec te calienta la garganta de forma agradable. Distingues un cierto picor, el sabor de un barril de madera de roble y un peculiar aroma a tierra. Sientes la paz, y la copa se vacía antes de lo que te habría gustado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アマセックがじんわりと喉を温める―ほのかなスパイスとオーク樽の風味、そして独特の土の香りが感じられる。少し穏やかな気分になり、思っていたよりも早くグラスが底をついてしまった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The amasec warms your throat pleasantly — you can make out a hint of spice, the flavour of an oak barrel, and a distinct earthy aroma. You feel a little more at peace, and you reach the bottom of the glass sooner than you'd like.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アマセックがじんわりと喉を温める―ほのかなスパイスとオーク樽の風味、そして独特の土の香りが感じられる。少し穏やかな気分になり、思っていたよりも早くグラスが底をついてしまった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Amasec wärmt angenehm deine Kehle – du schmeckst Gewürze heraus, das Eichenfass, in dem er gelagert wurde, sowie ein ganz leicht erdiges Aroma. Dich überkommt ein friedliches Gefühl, und das Glas ist schneller leer, als dir lieb ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The amasec warms your throat pleasantly — you can make out a hint of spice, the flavour of an oak barrel, and a distinct earthy aroma. You feel a little more at peace, and you reach the bottom of the glass sooner than you'd like.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Amasec wärmt angenehm deine Kehle – du schmeckst Gewürze heraus, das Eichenfass, in dem er gelagert wurde, sowie ein ganz leicht erdiges Aroma. Dich überkommt ein friedliches Gefühl, und das Glas ist schneller leer, als dir lieb ist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'amasec vous chauffe agréablement la gorge. Vous notez une pointe d'épice, le parfum d'un fût en chêne, et un arôme de terre assez distinct. Vous vous sentez {mf|apaisé|apaisée} et atteignez le fond du verre plus vite que vous ne l'auriez voulu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The amasec warms your throat pleasantly — you can make out a hint of spice, the flavour of an oak barrel, and a distinct earthy aroma. You feel a little more at peace, and you reach the bottom of the glass sooner than you'd like.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'amasec vous chauffe agréablement la gorge. Vous notez une pointe d'épice, le parfum d'un fût en chêne, et un arôme de terre assez distinct. Vous vous sentez {mf|apaisé|apaisée} et atteignez le fond du verre plus vite que vous ne l'auriez voulu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Amasek, boğazında hoş bir sıcaklık bırakıyor. Tutam baharatı, meşe fıçısının tadını ve o belirgin topraksı aromayı ayırt edebiliyorsun. İçin biraz daha huzura eriyor, kadehin dibini beklediğinden çabuk görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The amasec warms your throat pleasantly — you can make out a hint of spice, the flavour of an oak barrel, and a distinct earthy aroma. You feel a little more at peace, and you reach the bottom of the glass sooner than you'd like.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Amasek, boğazında hoş bir sıcaklık bırakıyor... Bir tutam baharatı, meşe fıçısının tadını ve belirgin bir topraksı aromayı ayırt edebiliyorsun. İçin biraz daha huzura eriyor ve kadehin dibini, istediğinden erken görüyorsun.{/n}
